channel.title: Boxing help again please(FIXED)

item.title: Boxing help again please(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

alright here is my new code:

if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7673)) { sM("you must fight with a fighter torso, and with boxing gloves on"); return; } else if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && p layerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) { sM("good luck!"); }

and here are the errors:

[code]
client.java:8699: illegal start of expression
if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && player
Equipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && player
Equipment[playerWeapon] != 7673)) {

                            ^

client.java:8702: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 &&
p layerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 &
& playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) {
^
client.java:8702: ‘)’ expected
} else if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 &&
p layerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 &
& playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) {

^
client.java:8702: not a statement
} else if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 &&
p layerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 &
& playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) {

                            ^

client.java:8702: ‘;’ expected
} else if(!isInBoxing() && (!inCombat) && playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 &&
p layerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 &
& playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) {

                                   ^

5 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

[size=14pt]EDIT:[/size] fixed errors thanks though!

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing help again please(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

ok heres my boolean for boxing:

public boolean isInBoxing() { if ((absX >= 3068 && absX <= 3075 && absY >= 3523 && absY <=3531)) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing help again please(FIXED)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

hey guys, I am currently making a boxing feature, and right now I am making a filter to check if they are wearing the boxing gloves and fighters torso if they fight in the boxing area. oh and heres sum help if you need it:

source - pk planet v3
revision - 317
fighter torso code - 430
blue boxing gloves code - 7673
red boxing gloves code - 7671

now for my code:

if(!InBoxing() && (!InCombat) && (playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7673)) { sM("you must fight with a fighter torso, and with boxing gloves on"); return; } else if(!InBoxing() && (!InCombat) && (playerEquipment[playerChest] != 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7671 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 430 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7673)) { sM("good luck!"); }

ok can someone it up for me? cuz I get these errors:

Read full topic
